english: to ask / to ask for / to request

présent.name: Présent (Present)

je.sentence: Je suis en train de demander de l'aide.

tu.sentence: Tu es en train de demander quoi?

il/elle.sentence: Elle est en train de demander le prix.
il/elle.sentenceEnglish: She is asking for the price.

on.sentence: On est en train de demander la permission.

nous.sentence: Nous sommes en train de demander des informations.

vous.sentence: Vous êtes en train de demander un service?
vous.sentenceEnglish: Are you asking for a favor?

ils/elles.sentence: Ils sont en train de demander le chemin.

présent.note: Regular -er verb. Pattern: je demande, tu demandes, il/elle demande, nous demandons, vous demandez, ils/elles demandent

passé.name: Passé (Past)

je.english: I asked / I asked for / I have asked

tu.english: you asked / you asked for / you have asked

il/elle.english: he/she asked / asked for / has asked

on.english: we asked / we asked for / we have asked

nous.english: we asked / we asked for / we have asked

vous.english: you asked / you asked for / you have asked

ils/elles.english: they asked / they asked for / they have asked

je.english: I asked / I was asking / I used to ask
je.sentenceEnglish: I always used to ask for help.

tu.english: you asked / you were asking / you used to ask

il/elle.english: he/she asked / was asking / used to ask
il/elle.sentenceEnglish: She often used to ask for directions.

on.english: we asked / we were asking / we used to ask

nous.english: we asked / we were asking / we used to ask
nous.sentenceEnglish: We used to ask for advice.

vous.english: you asked / you were asking / you used to ask
vous.sentenceEnglish: You were asking for too much.

ils/elles.english: they asked / they were asking / they used to ask
ils/elles.sentenceEnglish: They used to ask for money.

il/elle.sentenceEnglish: She had asked for the price.

passé.note: Regular past participle 'demandé'. Imparfait stem 'demand-' (from infinitive): je demandais, tu demandais, il/elle demandait, nous demandions, vous demandiez, ils/elles demandaient

futur.name: Futur (Future)

il/elle.sentenceEnglish: He will ask for the price.

je.english: I am going to ask / ask for
je.sentenceEnglish: I am going to ask for help.

tu.english: you are going to ask / ask for
tu.sentenceEnglish: What are you going to ask for?

il/elle.english: he/she is going to ask / ask for
il/elle.sentenceEnglish: She is going to ask for the price.

on.english: we are going to ask / ask for
on.sentenceEnglish: We are going to ask for permission.

nous.english: we are going to ask / ask for
nous.sentenceEnglish: We are going to ask for directions.

vous.english: you are going to ask / ask for
vous.sentenceEnglish: Are you going to ask for advice?

ils/elles.english: they are going to ask / ask for
ils/elles.sentenceEnglish: They are going to ask for forgiveness.

je.english: I will have asked / asked for
je.sentenceEnglish: I will have asked for help.

tu.english: you will have asked / asked for
tu.sentenceEnglish: Will you have asked for permission?

il/elle.english: he/she will have asked / asked for
il/elle.sentenceEnglish: She will have asked for the price.

on.english: we will have asked / asked for
on.sentenceEnglish: We will have asked for directions.

nous.english: we will have asked / asked for
nous.sentenceEnglish: We will have asked for forgiveness.

vous.english: you will have asked / asked for
vous.sentenceEnglish: Will you have asked for advice?

ils/elles.english: they will have asked / asked for
ils/elles.sentenceEnglish: They will have asked for news.

futur.note: Regular future stem 'demander-': je demanderai, tu demanderas, il/elle demandera, nous demanderons, vous demanderez, ils/elles demanderont. As a regular -er verb, 'demander' follows predictable conjugation patterns across all tenses: présent (je demande, nous demandons), imparfait (je demandais, nous demandions), futur simple (je demanderai, nous demanderons), and passé composé with 'avoir' (j'ai demandé). Common uses: 'demander quelque chose' (to ask for something), 'demander à quelqu'un' (to ask someone), 'demander de + infinitive' (to ask to do something), 'se demander' (to wonder - reflexive), 'demander la permission' (to ask for permission), 'demander pardon' (to ask for forgiveness), 'demander le chemin' (to ask for directions), 'demander un conseil' (to ask for advice), 'demander des nouvelles' (to ask for news). Note: 'demander' is a direct transitive verb in French and does not require a preposition when asking for something, unlike English 'to ask for'.
